select last_insert_id() as id
insert into cmfz_issue values(#{id},#{name},current_date(), #{score},#{author},#{brief},#{img},#{counts})
mapper.select: select issue.id issueid,issue.name issuename,issue.createDate issuecd ,issue.score issuescore,issue.author issueauthor, issue.brief issuebr,issue.img issueimg,issue.counts issuecouts,audio.id audioid, audio.name,audio.size,audio.url,audio.audioTime,audio.md5Code,audio.issueId parentId from cmfz_issue issue left join cmfz_audio audio on issue.id=audio.issueId order by issueid limit #{beginRow},#{pageSize}
